platformAttributes.ios.editorialNotes.st.k: Ne vous contentez pas de lire des livres : utilisez-les aussi pour frapper vos ennemis dans ce jeu de survie fantasque à l’ambiance rétro.
Don’t just hit the books–hit your enemies with them as well in this whimsical, retro-flavoured survival game.
在這款異想天開的復古生存遊戲中，化身掉入異世界的書迷，並用書本來攻擊敵人！
Don’t just hit the books – hit your enemies with them as well in this whimsical, retro-flavoured survival game.
Don’t just hit the books—hit your enemies with them as well in this whimsical, retro-flavored survival game.
本を置き、敵を叩きのめしましょう。遊び心あふれる、レトロ風味のサバイバルゲームです。
